name: Parallels (itch) (Tiger Collins)
description:
PARALLELS

Parallels is a project created for AndersonW during Studio 2 at SAE Institute.  The idea behind the project was to showcase at least one of his songs in what is essentially an interactive music video- the idea we came up with was Parallels.

When the game first starts, you'll only be experiencing part of the music. So you need to find the floating orbs around the maps to unlock new layers of the music to unlock the full experience!

PLEASE NOTE
THE BROWSER VERSION IS ONLY A DEMO. FULL EXPERIENCE WITH ALL FEATURES AND QUALITY SETTINGS CAN BE DOWNLOADED FOR OSX AND WIN7+. 

CONTROLS
Movement - W A S D.
Automovement - Inactivity for 10 seconds (NO KEYPRESSES).
Exit to mainmenu - ESCAPE in any level.
Exit game (Desktop Only) - ESCAPE on main menu.

CREDITS
Audio Designer - AndersonW
Game Designers - Nick Duxbury & Sholto Tiger Collins
Level Designers - Nick Duxbury
Programmars - Sholto Tiger Collins
Special Thanks - Mitchel Pryor & Brendan Keogh

KNOWN BUGS Galaxy Level - No Grass Waking Up In Japan Level - No Trees
